title: Global Hyper-Converged Infrastructure Leader Gridstore to Showcase at IP Expo Europe
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Gridstore, Inc. 
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA--(Marketwired - September 30, 2015) - Gridstore Â®, the leader in hyper-converged all flash infrastructure for the Microsoft Cloud-Inspired Data Center , today announced they will be showcasing their innovative hyper-converged infrastructure solutions at the upcoming IP Expo Europe being held at ExCel London, October 7-8, 2015, Stand E15. Delegates who visit Gridstore at Stand E15 will have the opportunity to learn how Gridstore is adding a new implementation option for customers that meets the rapidly growing need of IT organizations for a simple, easy-to-deploy solution, yet one that still allows highly elastic, independently scalable compute and storage. 
Tweet this: @gridstore #hyperconverged infrastructure leader to showcase @ IPEXPO ExCel London Stand E15 Register Now @ http://bit.ly/1OLm3Et 
IP Expo Europe is Europe's number one IT event for those looking to find out how the latest IT innovations can drive their business forward. IP Expo Europe allows visitors to explore, educate, interact and innovate in many ways: Understanding where the industry is heading Explore the technology that will enable the changing nature in which we work Engage with new tech innovators, as well as the global brands that are driving change Hear from experts on solution success stories -- ones that have worked, and also those that have not Understand the latest movements from all areas of enterprise IT 
Gridstore's HyperConverged Appliances (HCA) are purpose-built for the Microsoft Cloud-Inspired Data Center. The HCA brings together compute, SAN and storage into a single system that offers all-flash bare-metal performance, efficient scaling, and scale-to-fit design that eliminates costly compute sprawl. The Gridstore HyperConverged Appliance is an ideal platform for infrastructure refreshes and specific Windows workloads such as VDI, SQL Server, Dev/Test, Private Cloud and ROBO. Gridstore's HyperConverged Infrastructure supports Azure Pack, enabling deployment of Private-Cloud-in-a-Box easily and cost-effectively. Additionally, Gridstore's integration with System Center includes VMM for policy-based provisioning and orchestration of compute and storage resources at VM-level granularity and additional security, as well as support for WMI Counters for system-level monitoring, tracking, and reporting of key metrics such as IOPs and latency of each VM.
